title: Pencils
brief_description: Scenes showing children and adults writing, drawing, and doodling with every imaginable kind of pencil are intercut with sequences filmed at a factory where pencils are manufactured. The variety of pencils, sizes, shapes, colours and uses are conveyed without narration but with a lively musical score.
